subject: Guests are... confused by our website
body: So the good news is our website is getting attention. The bad news is some guests are showing up expecting a normal hotel experience. Lots of confused reviews about 'not knowing what they were getting into.'

subject: Distributors hate our dangerous aesthetic

subject: Food critic called us 'aggressively anti-customer'
